author: Simon Difford
description: This looks like a Caipirinha and has a similar balance of sweet, sour and spirit. The bitters bring out the spice in the rum, which is every bit as pungent as cachaça.
name: Kool Hand Luke
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE lime in base of glass to release juices
POUR other ingredients into glass, add crushed ice and CHURN (stir)
